title.narrative: United Kingdom National Commission for UNESCO (United Nations Educational,Scientific and Cultural Organisation)

description.narrative: This activity (United Kingdom National Commission for UNESCO (United Nations Educational,Scientific and Cultural Organisation)) is a component of United Kingdom National Commission for UNESCO (United Nations Educational,Scientific and Cultural Organisation) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £998,284. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). The start date is 01-08-2011 and the end date is 30-12-2014.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
